actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Trails West National Historical Park in the States of Nebraska and Wyoming, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the Trails West National Historical Park, in Nebraska and Wyoming, to commemorate the westward migration through the North Platte Valley. Provides for the acquisition of lands by the Secretary of the Interior and for the establishment of the park upon publication of notice in the Federal Register.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Trails West National Historical Park in the States of Nebraska and Wyoming, and for other purposes.
